text: Warner Bros. put a spell on Harry Potter fans Tuesday with the release of the first trailer for “ Fantastic Beasts : The Crimes of Grindelwald. ” In the trailer, Eddie Redmayne returns as the charmingly clumsy Newt Scamander, while Jude Law makes his Wizarding World debut as a young Albus Dumbledore. It ’ s teased that Scamander is acting under orders from Dumbledore to head to Paris, but as the future - Hogwarts headmaster notes, Scamander isn ’ t one for taking orders well. The David Yates film follows Dumbledore and Scamander, his former student, as they join forces to recapture an escaped Gellert Grindelwald, played by Johnny Depp, who is on a mission to dominate
